document.full_text: more than 700 people were injured, 70 of them seriously, when two south african commuter trains collided in the soweto township outside johannesburg, officials said friday.
document.title: south africa commuter train crash injures more than 700
lines_and_colors: more than 700 people were injured, 70 of them seriously, when two south african commuter trains collided in the soweto township outside johannesburg, officials said friday.
